author: philngo
content: Hey everyone! If you’re still planning to pitch a talk/presentation for the light client summit in Istanbul, please ensure you’ve signalled here with your pitch. Deadline for submission is Sunday Oct 22

author: philngo
content: For those who already have access to the co-working space at the Istanbul Congress Center, if you didn’t manage to get a ticket in time for the light client summit due to room capacity restrictions, you can show up on the day of to see if we can fit you in (basically a standby line). No guarantees for access, but that’s the best chance at this point.
